headline: Nordson Appoints Anurag Tandon as Sales Manager for EDI Product Line in India
summary: Chippewa Falls, Wisconsin, USA - Nordson Corporation's Polymer Processing Systems division has announced the appointment of Anurag Tandon as Sales Manager for the EDI extrusion and fluid coating die...
